document_data.name: Chasstil
document_data.mainbody: '''Chasstil''' was a vegetable found in [[South Faerûn|southern]] and [[Southeast Faerûn|southeastern]] [[Faerûn]].{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|49}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 41: Delzemaeran Delicacies, Part 3}}
document_data.Description: The chasstil plant had stalks that looked like twisted green spears that were edible. It was a main ingredient in [[mlael]], a possibly spicy brown gravy favored by the people of [[Delzimmer]] ''circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1372}}.
